sentences.sContent: Back to back! Wrap yourselves up!
sentences.sCn: 背对背！把你们自己包起来！

sentences.sContent: Go and build a house for yourselves.
sentences.sContent_eng: Go and build a house for yourselves.
sentences.sCn: 去为你们自己造一幢房子吧。

sentences.sContent: Not just for yourselves, but for your generation and generations to come.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not just for yourselves, but for your generation and generations to come.
sentences.sCn: 不只是为你们自己，而且是为你们一代人以及未来的几代人。

trans.tranCn: 你们自己； 你们亲自
